resources.cancelFailureOrder: We were unable to cancel your order. Please contact Customer Service at 1-800-886-2966.
resources.cancelFailureItem: We were unable to cancel your item. Please contact Customer Service at 1-800-886-2966.
resources.successMessageText: Your request to cancel an item is submitted successfully
resources.staticContentLine3: Orders placed for in-stock items before 3pm Eastern Time will ship the same day.Orders placed after 3pm Eastern Time will ship the following business day.
resources.orderLineDetailsInfo: (Select multiple products to add to cart/cancel)
resources.staticContentLine1: All orders are viewable in the Order Status section regardless of how placed.
resources.staticContentLine2: To ensure you receive your items as quickly as possible, orders for in-stock items are immediately sent to our distribution center for shipping.Please check Order Status Actions column to see if cancellation is possible.
resources.errorMessageText: There is a problem with your order, please try again in sometime or call 1-XXX-XXX-XXXX
